recipe.title: Shallot Yogurt
ingredients: 1 tablespoon extra-virgin olive oil plus more for drizzling
instructions: Mix shallots, yogurt, and 1 tablespoon oil in a medium bowl; season with salt. Cover and chill at least 6 hours to let flavors meld.
Drizzle shallot yogurt with more oil.
DO AHEAD: Shallot yogurt can be made 1 day ahead. Keep chilled.
